lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods will skip the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Bermuda because, he said, he wanted the longest break of his career to spend time with his baby daughter. Woods will be replaced in the four-man field at the Mid Ocean Club by Jim Furyk.
snippet: Tiger Woods will skip the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Bermuda because, he said, he wanted the longest break of his career to spend time with his baby daughter. Woods will be replaced in the four-man field at the Mid Ocean Club by Jim Furyk.
